DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether , patient moderate severe plaque-type psoriasis , AIN457 administer subcutaneously reduce severity psoriasis symptom extent patient 's body area affect disease ( compare placebo ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Ranging Study AIN457 Patients With Moderate Severe Chronic Plaque-type Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Chronic plaquetype psoriasis diagnose least 6 month time randomization At randomization , moderate severe psoriasis define : PASI score 12 great , IGA score 3 great , Body Surface Area ( BSA ) affect plaquetype psoriasis 10 % great At screen randomization , chronic plaquetype psoriasis consider inadequately controlled topical treatment . Forms psoriasis chronic plaquetype Druginduced psoriasis ( e.g. , new onset current exacerbation betablockers , calcium channel inhibitor lithium ) randomization Previous exposure AIN457 Ongoing use prohibit psoriasis treatment / medication prohibit medication randomization . Washout period detail protocol adhered Known immunosuppression ( e.g. , AIDS ) screen / randomization History evidence active tuberculosis screen Active systemic infection ( common cold ) History symptom malignancy organ system , treat untreated , within past 5 year . Any severe , progressive uncontrolled medical condition randomization judgment investigator prevents patient participate study Any clinically significant abnormal laboratory test randomization , judgment investigator prevents patient participate study Inability unwillingness undergo repeat venipuntures History evidence drug alcohol abuse Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
